titles.title: Eliot Ness ATF Building Designation Act

A bill to designate the Federal building housing the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives Headquarters located at 99 New York Avenue NE., Washington, DC, as the "Eliot Ness ATF Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 1/13/2014--Introduced. Eliot Ness ATF Building Designation Act - Designates the federal building housing the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) Headquarters located at 99 New York Avenue, N.E., Washington, D.C., as the "Eliot Ness ATF Building."
